options.text: Azure Batch Account is a uniquely identified entity within the Batch service. Most Batch solutions use Azure Storage for storing resource files and output files, so each Batch account is usually associated with a corresponding storage account. This connector lets you stream your Azure Batch Account diagnostics logs into Microsoft Sentinel, allowing you to continuously monitor activity.
